ProductInfo.Features:
A bubbly and fashionable gadget coming in 3 colours: light pink, solid white, solid black. This is perfect for matching to other accessories and also having the functionality you need from a gadget
This phone is unlocked with a maximum picture resolution of 640x480 and various media format support. FM radio is built-in and Bluetooth is support.
Special features include an alarm clock, weatherproof, stylus, built-in mic/speakers and more
•500 Contacts •Handwriting (English, Chinese) •Chat function
•Caller Picture  •Caller Ringtone  •Sound Recorder
